<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inspire Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=188) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 100 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[maestro muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You learn the [_inspire defense_](/Spells.aspx?ID=387) composition cantrip, which protects you and allies.

<title level="2">Inspire Defense leads to...</title>
[Defensive Coordination](/Feats.aspx?ID=1641)
name: Inspire Defense
